description: This file defines a Dart class 'AppTheme' that provides application-wide themes for a Flutter project, including light and dark themes with color schemes and styling details.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static theme configurations for light and dark modes in Flutter.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static final variable defining the application's light theme data.

methods.name: darkTheme
methods.description: A static final variable defining the application's dark theme data.
